name: Hungry Hungry Lumby
description:
A game about being a hungry Lumbricus terrestris. Eat enough food and you will be able to move forward to the next level, or stay on the level to set a new highscore. Just make sure to stay away from the other lifeforms in the world.

Game Modes:
  • Normal - Multiple lives, multiple levels. Eat enough food and the exit will open. Beat all levels and set a new highscore.
  • Infinity - One life, one level. Try to set a new highscore.
Special Food Types:
  • Energetic - Gives you a higher score than normal food, but also more energy. Beware, too much energy will increase your speed.
  • Fat - Decreases the energy but increases your length more than normal food. Will decrease your speed if the energy bar is empty.
  • Popcorn - Eating these will spawn multiple food items at random locations.
Enemy Types:
  • Shy - Afraid of contact, will do anything to not walk into something.
  • Hungry - Always hungry, will constantly look left and right to find food close by.
  • Sprinty - Likes the speed, sprints short distances but gets tired and must slow down in between the dashes.
  • Jumpy - The mad one, keeps skipping around out of joy.
  • Sleepy - Should have stayed in bed, will take naps now and then. Will eat food out of lazyness, if the food is in the way it's the foods fault that it will be eaten and not Sleepys.
Controls:

Use arrow keys to change direction.

Note:

Only 64-bit builds available for Windows and Linux.
